name: Heads-Up
description:
Note, In some levels. The player is transparent. I don't know why. and this only happens in the web version. Also, The head was suppose to make a sound when he hits something. However, Its sounds weird in the web version so It's removed. For better experience, please play the downloadable versions.

The Robot has to collect bubbles in the bubble factory. However, some of the bubbles are out of the robot's reach. So how does he collect them. By using his head as ammo of course. You need to throw the head of your player. So that he is lighter. However. If the head dies, then the body dies as well.

Controls are in the game.

Updates:

Fixed a bug that when you got crushed, you do not die and the game softlocks.
